history.proof: intros m n H. qsimpl use: prop2. qsimpl use: prop2,Z. hauto lq: on use: Z.mul_1_r, Z.divide_sub_r, Zdivide_intro, Zis_gcd_intro, Z.divide_add_r unfold: rel_prime.

exceptions.exn: In environment m, n : Z H : rel_prime (m + n) (m - n) Unable to unify "Zis_gcd (?M1837 * ?M1837) (?M1838 * ?M1838) 1" with "Zis_gcd m n 1".

exceptions.tactic: apply Z.divide_antisym with (n := Z.add m n) (m := Z.sub m n).

original: intros m n H. apply prop2. apply Z.divide_antisym with (n := Z.add m n) (m := Z.sub m n). - apply Zdivide_add_r; auto. - apply Zdivide_sub_r; auto.
